# Quarto


It is a next-generation tool for authoring documents that combines Markdown with code execution in languages like R, Python, and Julia. It is designed for producing high-quality outputs in various formats like HTML and PDF.


This is a Quarto website.

To learn more about Quarto websites visit <https://quarto.org/docs/websites>.

::: callout
**Quarto** is an open source tools for scientific and technical publishing.
:::

# Markdown

Markdown is a plain text format that is designed to be easy to write, and, even more importantly, easy to read.
